citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
**A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:45 a.m.
on 03/14/2016. Made several attempts to contact the owner on the home phone but was unable to leave a
message on the answering machine and the cell phone number listed was not accepting calls.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
**A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:45 a.m.
on 03/14/2016.  Made several attempts to contact the owner on the home phone but was unable to leave a
message on the answering machine and the cell phone number listed was not accepting calls.
